docs.text: Ashreach/ThLun

docs.title: About
docs.text: ThLun is a Python CLI library for stylish terminal output with ANSI colors, logging, progress bars, and spinners.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text: pip install thlun

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
from ThLun import bprint, Logger, ProgressBar, Spinner, Spinners
import time

# Basic colored output
bprint("[GREEN]Hello world...[RESET]")

# Logging with levels
logger = Logger('DEBUG')
logger.info("Application started")
logger.error("Something went wrong")

# Progress bar
progress = ProgressBar(total=100)
for i in range(100):
    progress.update(i + 1)
    time.sleep(0.01)

# Spinner for loading
spinner = Spinner(Spinners.dots)
spinner.start("Loading...")
time.sleep(2)
spinner.stop()

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• ANSI Colors: Full color support with Fore, Back, and Style classes
  • IO Module: Enhanced printing with color and style support
  • Logger: Multi-level logging with colored output
  • Progress Bars: Visual progress indicators
  • Spinners: Loading animations with customizable styles
  • Screen Control: Clear screen and cursor positioning
